FuncDef:
The radius-server format-attribute lts-tunnel vendor 2352 command configures a vendor-specific encapsulation format for LTS user tunnel attributes.
The undo radius-server format-attribute lts-tunnel vendor 2352 command deletes the vendor-specific encapsulation format of LTS user tunnel attributes.
By default, no vendor-specific encapsulation format is configured for LTS user tunnel attributes.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the default format specified by the vendor.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the Redback encapsulation format for LTS user tunnel attributes when the device interacts with Redback devices, run the radius-server format-attribute lts-tunnel vendor 2352 command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
